Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham had a monster game with 32 points and nine assists and Jalen Duren supplied 14 points and 12 rebounds as the Detroit Pistons outlasted the Portland Trail Blazers 118-115.
Post-Match Reflections: The Detroit Pistons reached.500 for the first time after New Yearâ€™s Day since 2019 with a 118-115 win over the Portland Trail Blazers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons (18-18), who were 3-33 after 36 games a season ago, have won seven of eight.
Others: Anfernee Simons had 36 points and nine assists for Portland, while Shaedon Sharpe had 20 points, eight assists and eight rebounds.
